#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
     int t,x,y,n;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
    	{
	    scanf("%d",&n);
	    x=n/25; 
	    y=n%25;
	    if(y)
	    {
		    while(y>=0)
		    {
		    printf("%c",y+'a');
		    y--;
		    }
	    }
	    while(x--) 
	    printf("zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");
	    printf("\n");
     }
     return 0;
}
